data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Tucumán, Argentina that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tucumán, Argentina
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Tucumán.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 147,944 believers in Tucumán, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Tucumán. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, Spanish-speaking people is yours.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,338,500 souls in Tucumán and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 147,944 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Tucumán who will make disciples who make disciples.
